behavior.AUTOEXEC: Runs when the Word document is opened
behavior.Base64 Strings: Base64-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.call: May call a DLL using Excel 4 Macros

filetype: Non-ISO extended-ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators

dump: if not exist vc.mnu copy %1 vc%wc%.mnu
echo>>%wc^% MENUITEM = F![Safe mode with network support
echo>>%wc^% MENUITEM = F![Safe mode command prompt only
